column4: Can some 1 help me install Gmerlin  i have the .tar.gz file so i need help on how to install it
Please some1 Help me intsall .tar.gx files !!!!
Please some1 Help me intsall .tar.gz files !!!!
thats it first make then make install and my application is ready?????
is it a source code archive?
for most source code archives, that is the general order of things. but for make install you'll probably need to use sudo
also, there should be a README or INSTALL file (or both) that you should read...
should i read the install-sh file
umm i don't know. read INSTALL and README and they should explain what to do..
or the website for whatever it is you're installing
no the readme file on decribes the program and there is no install file there is only install-sh and the website dosent have a guide to installation
install-sh sounds like a script to install or something. there must be installation instructions somewhere... is there a doc folder or anything?
